articles.author: Maegan Vazquez
articles.title: Trump taps Brooke Rollins for agriculture secretary, rounding out Cabinet picks - The Washington Post
articles.description: Rollins has recently run the America First Policy Institute, which has largely stayed out of the spotlight but has made numerous proposals for the second term.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump announced on Saturday that he has picked Brooke Rollins, a former Trump White House policy adviser, to serve as agriculture secretary.
It is my Great Honor to nominate B… [+328 chars]

articles.title: Can RFK Jr make America's diet healthy again? - BBC.com
articles.description: Kennedy's plans to ban dyes in cereals and fluoride in water could get major pushback from the food industry.
articles.content:
RFK Jr has pledged to tackle ultra-processed foods, food dyes and additives
Robert F Kennedy Jr has set his sights on changing how Americans eat and drink.
